{"33":{"class_type":"LoraLoaderModelOnly","inputs":{"lora_name":"eigen-banana-qwen-image-edit-2509-fp16-lora.safetensors","strength_model":0.5,"model":["27",0]},"_meta":{"title":"Load LoRA"}},"34":{"class_type":"VAEDecode","inputs":{"vae":["30",0],"samples":["31",0]},"_meta":{"title":"VAE Decode"}},"35":{"class_type":"CFGNorm","inputs":{"strength":1,"model":["28",0]},"_meta":{"title":"CFGNorm"}},"25":{"class_type":"LoadImage","inputs":{"image":"4cb42523a79890a18396715725f85a9f85ec67e77015a944d6eb7040bdc66aba.png"},"_meta":{"title":"Load Image"}},"36":{"class_type":"LoraLoaderModelOnly","inputs":{"lora_name":"Put it here_QwenEdit_V0.1，全面功能增强保持一致性！去油腻_V0.1.safetensors","strength_model":1,"model":["33",0]},"_meta":{"title":"Load LoRA"}},"26":{"class_type":"CLIPLoader","inputs":{"clip_name":"qwen_2.5_vl_7b_fp8_scaled.safetensors","type":"qwen_image","device":"default"},"_meta":{"title":"Load CLIP"}},"37":{"class_type":"LoraLoaderModelOnly","inputs":{"lora_name":"Qwen-Image-Edit-Lightning-8steps-V1.0-bf16.safetensors","strength_model":1,"model":["36",0]},"_meta":{"title":"Load LoRA"}},"48":{"class_type":"TextEncodeQwenImageEdit","inputs":{"prompt":"1. 景别词（决定画面范围）
根据人脸在画面中占据的比例，可分为以下等级：
近景 (Close-up, CU)：拍摄人物胸部以上的范围。这种镜头能清晰表现面部神情，同时保留一定的肩膀轮廓。
特写 (Big Close-up / Headshot)：拍摄人物肩部以上，画面焦点完全锁定在脸部。常用于强化人物情绪或捕捉细微的表情变化。
大特写 (Extreme Close-up, ECU)：仅拍摄局部细节，如眼睛、嘴唇或睫毛。这种镜头极具视觉冲击力，能展现极其私密或强烈的心理状态。 
2. 摄影技术词（专业化描述）
如果您是在指导摄影师或使用 AI 生成工具，可以使用以下专业术语：
镜头焦段：
85mm / 100mm / 135mm：这些中长焦段是人像摄影的“黄金焦段”，能产生自然的透视感和优美的背景虚化（Bokeh）。
微距 (Macro)：若要拍摄极其细微的皮肤纹理或虹膜，需提及“微距镜头”。
光圈设置：
大光圈 (f/1.4, f/1.8)：创造极浅的景深，使背景完全模糊，让观众视线集中在瞳孔等焦点上。
对焦点：通常描述为“眼神对焦 (Focus on the eyes)”，确保肖像的灵魂——眼睛清晰锐利。 
3. 视觉风格与情绪（丰富画面感）
光影效果：
侧逆光 (Rim Light)：在轮廓边缘形成光晕，增加立体感。
蝴蝶光 (Paramount Lighting)：在鼻下形成蝴蝶状阴影，常用于时尚女性肖像。
画面质感：描述为“极致细节 (Hyper-realistic)”、“电影感 (Cinematic)”或“真实肤质 (Raw skin texture)”，避免画面过于平淡。"},"_meta":{"title":"TextEncodeQwenImageEdit"}},"27":{"class_type":"UNETLoader","inputs":{"weight_dtype":"default","unet_name":"qwen_image_edit_2509_bf16.safetensors"},"_meta":{"title":"Load Diffusion Model"}},"38":{"class_type":"EmptyLatentImage","inputs":{"batch_size":2,"width":["52",0],"height":["53",0]},"_meta":{"title":"Empty Latent Image"}},"28":{"class_type":"ModelSamplingAuraFlow","inputs":{"shift":3,"model":["37",0]},"_meta":{"title":"ModelSamplingAuraFlow"}},"39":{"class_type":"Get Image Size","inputs":{"image":["25",0]},"_meta":{"title":"Get Image Size"}},"29":{"class_type":"ConditioningZeroOut","inputs":{"conditioning":["40",0]},"_meta":{"title":"ConditioningZeroOut"}},"40":{"class_type":"TextEncodeQwenImageEditPlus","inputs":{"vae":["30",0],"image1":["25",0],"prompt":"保持图片不变,保持参考图中人物头部所有细节都不改变,只改变以下内容：背景为纯净淡蓝色墙壁,Raw skin texture，Hyper-realistic,极致细节, 照片级写实,人物穿白色抹胸包臀裙，全身照","clip":["26",0]},"_meta":{"title":"TextEncodeQwenImageEditPlus"}},"30":{"class_type":"VAELoader","inputs":{"vae_name":"qwen_image_vae.safetensors"},"_meta":{"title":"Load VAE"}},"41":{"class_type":"SaveImage","inputs":{"filename_prefix":"ComfyUI","images":["34",0]},"_meta":{"title":"Save Image"}},"52":{"class_type":"SeargeIntegerMath","inputs":{"op":"a * b","a":["39",0],"b":1,"c":0},"_meta":{"title":"Integer Math-width"}},"31":{"class_type":"KSampler","inputs":{"scheduler":"simple","negative":["29",0],"denoise":1,"latent_image":["38",0],"seed":203130186829796,"cfg":1,"sampler_name":"euler","model":["35",0],"positive":["40",0],"steps":8},"_meta":{"title":"KSampler"}},"53":{"class_type":"SeargeIntegerMath","inputs":{"op":"a * b","a":["39",1],"b":1,"c":0},"_meta":{"title":"Integer Math-height"}}}
